name: Michelle's Soft Sugar Cookies
author: MISSMR94
summary: These sugar cookies have won raves from all who have tried them. They are soft and have a light and delicate flavor.  They're great for Christmastime cut outs.
directions: Cream the margarine and add the sugar gradually
Add eggs one at time, mixing well after each addition
Add the flour, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt gradually to the creamed mixture, stirring in by hand
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Line baking sheets with parchment paper
Roll dough out on a floured surface to 1/8 to 1/4 inch thick and cut into your favorite shapes
Place cookies onto the prepared baking sheets
Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 6 to 8 minutes or until cookie has a golden appearance
